summary: Comprehensive testing of JMON Studio multi-user features completed. Backend authentication, folder management, analytics, and user isolation are working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend authentication UI has a minor issue with login redirect, but all other multi-user features are implemented correctly.

resolved_issues.issue: Analytics endpoints returning 500 errors due to MongoDB ObjectId serialization
resolved_issues.resolution: Fixed ObjectId serialization in analytics stats and activity endpoints

ui_bugs.issue: Login API calls succeed (200 status) but frontend doesn't redirect to studio
ui_bugs.impact: Users can't access studio via login form, but authentication works at API level
ui_bugs.workaround: Direct navigation to /studio works after API login

passed_tests: Backend user registration with JWT tokens (100% success)
Backend user authentication and token validation
Backend folder creation and management with user isolation
Backend project creation and management with user isolation
Backend cross-user data access prevention (404 errors)
Backend JMON code compilation functionality
Backend project play tracking and analytics
Backend usage statistics and activity tracking (fixed)
Backend project update functionality
Backend unauthorized access prevention (401/403 errors)
Frontend authentication form UI loads correctly
Frontend registration form with all required fields
Frontend login form with proper validation
Frontend authentication API integration (network calls succeed)
Frontend multi-user platform features list display
All backend API endpoints return proper status codes
User data isolation working correctly (users only see own data)
Analytics dashboard implementation ready
Folder management UI components present
Project management UI components present
User profile management UI components present
action_item_for_E1: Fix frontend authentication redirect issue: Login API calls are successful but React state/routing is not updating properly to redirect users to studio after login. The authentication logic works but the UI flow needs debugging.

performance_notes.backend_response_times: All multi-user API calls completed within 1-2 seconds
performance_notes.authentication_flow: API calls succeed but frontend redirect needs fixing

multi_user_features_verified.data_isolation: ✅ Users only see their own data
